description: Yeehaa, a digital marketing and business development expert, authored 'Align the Misaligned' which advocates for 'ecosystem architecture' in tech, bringing sustainability and innovation. They excel in developing and executing growth-driven marketing strategies. With 10+ years in top marketing firms, Yeehaa leads successful projects driving revenue and brand visibility through digital tools and industry trends.
blurb: Highly proficient digital marketing and business development strategist.
